content.detailedDescription:
My son and i,coming home from a cub scout meeting in black hawk sd,2or so miles from our house.Ready to turn onto our road,my son asks me,whats that dad? no answer to give,i didn't respond.Once again what is that dad? i don't know son,drove down road a couple hundred feet,and stopped the truck,told my son to stay in the truck,as i,just like the movies,get out of the truck,standing in headlights,in curiosity.Triangular,at least,1000 feet long,maybe 10 feet high,like a stealth bomber,but huge,no sound,vibration,movement,just a dome shaped light,just back from the nose,underside.The only difference in the whole sighting between my son and i was,the color of the light.
a little yellow car pulls up, and asked if everything is alright? i pointed to the craft,as the car,gave r the honest onion,and i mean onion. well fight or flight,rips through my mind,of the thought of my son in the truck. i drive home,a quarter mile or so,trying to lighten the mood with my 8 year old son,joking,all i what from them is a anti gravity suit for motocross. my son went inside,and i walked back down the road,and nothing was seen.
oh ya,ellsworth air force base is visible from where craft was.:
content.summary: Huge triangle,stealthy

content.detailedDescription: I usually wake up on the weekends to take pictures of sunrises and since i didn't go out and do that for the last 3 weekends previously in may i wasn't sure what time the sky started to brighten up.  so i woke up at 4am and laid in bed for 5 minutes and got up and took a peek out the west bedroom window and looked up at the sky and noticed it was dark still, also noticing a bright object in the sky.  i thought it was a drone at first but said why would anyone be flying a drone at this time of morning.  i quickly ruled out the northern star as this object was in the form of a triangle shape hovering with colored lights.  the bedroom window was already open and i opened it a little farther to listen if it had a sound or anything and there was no noise.  i went to the other bedroom quickly and grabbed the canon rebel sl1 camera and manually changed the settings to take the best picture i could being that it was dark out.  the camera in auto mode wanted to take the picture with the flash on so i put it in manual and adjusted the camera settings without flash to get the best possible still picture i could.  after 30 seconds away from the window to grab the camera from the other room i came back to the window and looked at the object and realized that it was hovering and the lights were changing colors and not in sequential order.  the object slowly hovering and moving what seemed to me west so away from me but moving northwest at the same time slowly moving and hovering away from me in a northwest to west direction.  after 45 minutes sitting in front of the window and taking only 1 picture at this time i realized it was not a drone, the moon, helicopter, weather balloon, northern star, hot air balloon, any military that i know of without sound, this was not a flare either.  i took 2 more picture at 5:15am because the sky was getting a little brighter out and i wanted to get a picture when the sky was at the brightest but before i lost it because of the treeline shown in the picture.  i remember feeling excited and shocked at the same time!!!  i know what i saw and won't forget it and on a saturday early morning at 4am, thru 6am there is not any noise outside very still so i would have heard a sound coming from it if it was something normal in occurrence.  i believe and know this is a ufo because i can't explain what the object was and never seen something that bright and not make noise but hover and move very slowly into the west and north west direction.
content.summary: Very bright like the northern star with multi colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the patio having a cigarette. out of the corner of my eye i noticed what i thought was the moon. but after a couple more drags off my smoke i looked up to my left and saw what i still thought was the moon, but something was odd. the brightness was what made me want to look. it seemed as bright as a clear sky full moon, but was only what looked like a crescent moon. as i observed, the (moon) it starded changing shape and almost looked like it was melting and then swirling like a vortex. i liken it to a lava lamp. after a minute or two of this yellow-orange display it turned into an orb and in creased in size, and then it shrank to nothing. i don't know what i saw. it wasn't a disk or cigar shaped craft, as far as i could tell anyways. maybe it was a portal. i don't know know.
content.summary: Morphing and swirling moon, like a lava lamp, which then turned into an orb that  got bigger, then smaller until it faded out.

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i have seen 3 ufos (over myrtle beach, south carolina) in the past 2 years. one night i woke up to use the rest room and when i came out of the bathroom i noticed a bright light in the room next to my bedroom. it was coming in from the window like a beam. i could see shadows moving in this beem. it seemed to be 2 beings moving around outside the 2nd floor window. as i watched the beem slowly dissipated. i started to become afraid and i tried to run past the window to get back to my bed. another beam of light shot through a different window and "grabbed" my legs. i felt a great vibration and then i "woke up" again standing at the foot of my bed. i have no memory of making it into the room, the light had grabbed me when i was approaching the door to my bedroom.
content.summary: After observing 3 ufos over myrtle beach, i awoke one night to lights in my room. a beam of light grabbed my legs. i awoke in another area of my house.

content.detailedDescription: I watch the sky for all things, stars, weather, maybe to see what i saw here 3 years this october of the giant triangle. today was for the weather to golf this a.M. when i went outside and stood in the street to look around at the sky i noticed it being clear. when i started looking at those stars to get my bearings, i caught this star moving. it was just moving so fast,...I was wishing i had brought my phone out with me. i just said in a normal voice is anyone else seeing this? i have neighbors that are also up early and wanted to make sure if anyone was in earshot they could also witness this.  i have seen when i was a child and saw recently the same thing i saw as a child. triangle with no sound but i felt and smelled a negative ionic change in the air. that was moving very slowly at a very low altitude heading in the same direction east.Lost sight of objects in the horizon.
content.summary: First was fast @087 degrees headx no sonic boomthought it first to be sat. second slower heading 185 degrees

content.detailedDescription:
This is an old event but as i am watching the mufon files i thought i would add this even. 

in 1984 i was an appretice baker working at the milton ulladulla bakery. the rear of the bakery had a verandah where we also cooled off our large racks of bread. i had a habit of standing on the balcony and looking at the sky to guage the weather as i often went shooting on my way home if i got away whilst it was dark. 
the bakery is elevated and you can see the coast and inlet in the distance. i noticed a really bright light and thought it was just headlights. as my night vision cleared (it was darker outside) i noticed that the light was actually above the headland. i thought it must have been a new street lamp of unusual brightness. but then a second light appeared perhaps 100 meters from it and same elevation and that one was clearly out last land over the ocean. more and more appeared, some faded. the brightness intensity was incredible. the colours were different too. some looked just white while others had a red glow to them. 

at the time i thought i was watchign ball lightening as i had read a lot about that phenomena but whilst there was cloud in the sky it was not stormy and there was no electrical feel. the lights did not move or travel they simply appeared brightened and eventually blinked out. the most i say at once was about 6. i wanted to watch more but my boss came out looking for me and told me to get my arse back inside. i tried to show him but he was not interested. typical greek !

over the years i have learned a lot about ufo and ball lightening. i am an amature astronomer so i know what the planets look like especially venus. i am aware of temperature inversions and light reflections and what i saw in my teens was none of that.  i had also seen what appeared to be a slow moving comet crash into the ocean in the same region too but it happened so fast i had not time to alert anyone else to it. from what i know of meteors or comets they would move faster, be brighter and would not leave a white streak all the way to the water. or not. 

the water off the coast there is in a wide bay with inlets. from my scuba diving experience the water can be quite deep, too deep to dive. the location is quite isolated and in the country most people go to bed at 9pm so watchign this at almost 2am it is easy to believe that if these objects ere not natural phenomena they would not expect to be observed. 

i have not seen anything remotely interesting since that time.  i do look and i of course carry a camera with me when i am out but i do not hide my breath becaue my phone camera struggles to take a picture of the moon let alone anything else.  

i am well educated and i do believe there is something going on. there are too many witnesses. i would love to help interview people as i have a background in nlp, counselling and even have a hypnotherapy business so i can use hypnotherapy to help witnesses remember without planting suggestions and creating halucinations. 

if you need someone with my skills let me know.  i would like to push for more openness about ufo's especially in light of historical debunking like project blue book etc.

brett moore.
content.summary: Lights that appeared brightened faded. repeatedly for over 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I've been star gazing all my 58 years and i have never seen anything like this,i was looking up at the stars when a very bright object came over roof of our house from west and appeared to be moving very fast directly east and as it passed overhead it started to fade out and disappear. did anyone else see this over salem at 11:40 pm thursday evening we have high airaft traffic and this was something else, i kept looking for running lights or sound and it looked to be too bright to be an aircraft then it faded out to nothing like it just faded to other dimension, it appeared to be controlled but i did not see it turn but i was awestruck and thought i had seen something strange. the sky was super clear and this object appeared to be directly overhead and at least 2 or 3 thousand feet high possibly even higher at first i thought it was a plane but after i started watching it i knew it was something else, then it faded to nothing and i couldn't believe i had just seen this.
content.summary: When outside for cig looking at stars overhead very bright light passed overhead west to east as it passed it slowly faded to black not a plane one very large bright light and very strange disappearance

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 501 north from myrtle beach towards my house. it was around 1:05 am when i first noticed the light. i was passing the conway hospital on my left and i could see this strange bright golden star.It just looked like a gold light in the sky. it is not super big, but it somehow caught my attention. i was mainly curious about what it was. i figured it was just a plane or something at first, put it did not move in the sky really as i was driving down the road. so i just kept watching it to figure it out because it was getting noticeably larger after a minute or so of driving. i became curious because i could not figure out what it was. i took the exit for 501 business and was approaching the wooded forest right beside the conway bridge and i could tell that i was close to the light. i cruised along slowly trying to see the light through the treeline. about 3/4 of the way down the wooded road before the bridge i come up even with the light and for a couple seconds i could see the source. i saw this triangular metal object in the sky.The object was darker grey in color from what i could tell, and there may have been a little texture on the bottom of the object as well (i mainly mean that the bottom did not look completely smooth). it was unmoving to me the whole time i saw the object, but i was too far away to perceive smaller movements for most of the event. i saw placed around this object's edge three colors of lights. yellow, white, and red. they were not blinking. at first i thought it was a radio or cell tower, but then i saw no supporting structures near the object and did not know what was going on. i lost sight after a couple of seconds. i was freaking out a little bit, but i wanted to be very sure i was not just seeing something like a tower. so i turned right down state rd s 26-14 to see what was going on. i lost sight of the object after passing it, and then a few seconds later i made the turn. i drove slowly looking for any sign of any lights or man made structures. i drive down the whole road and i saw no lights. i figured it could be just the road i was on that kept me from seeing any lights even though i should have a better view of them. i proceed to drive back towards myrtle beach on 501 for a little bit so that i can come back the same way i can and see the light from where i already saw it. whenever i turned around (just before the olivers on 501 business) i could not see the light that i had seen before. at this point i am freaking out a little. while im driving back towards the bridge i keep scanning the sky for any sign of what i had witnessed earlier. i saw nothing, i drove over into downtown conway and i turned around so i could be on top of the bridge and look back towards the treeline where i was originally seeing the object. there was still nothing that i saw, so i drove for a bit, turned around, and went home. it was a clear night sky, it was around mid 70's fahrenheit. not very much wind.
content.summary: I noticed a golden glow on my drive home. i got close and saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
June 11, 2015. 10:55 pm. pacific time. oliver, bc.

i went outside for a cigarette at about 10:55 pacific time in oliver, british columbia, canada. i was looking to the south. i wanted to look at the stars. 

i immediately noticed two bright stars about four fingers apart (arm outstretched) to the south, just to the right of antares, and slightly above. i was disturbed, because i am a frequent star-watcher, and there are no such bright stars in that location at this time of year. i was immediately drawn to them.

i watched them, slightly perplexed, for about a minute and a half, all the while thinking "those shouldn't be there". they were stationary.

after about a minute they began to move northwards (towards me) and within seconds they began to fade, and then winked out with small flickers. the time from when they began to fade to when they disappeared was approximately 3 seconds. they were slightly brighter just before they faded, almost as though they winked back to full brightness before they disappeared, just for a split second. they were moving for about 2 seconds before they started to fade.
 
i sat there absolutely baffled, and then ran inside, not sure what to do or who to tell. i kept going back outside to see if they had come back. i kept thinking maybe i imagined the movement and they were covered by some clouds but they never came back. even as i'm writing this i keep pausing to go back outside and look for them.

i've been watching the sky for years, and i've never seen anything like this. they were white-blue stars, seemingly no different than any other, comparably bright to the brightest stars in the southern sky. 

i feel very strange writing this, but this was honestly not normal and mufon was the only place i could think of to report something like this.

they seemed far away, anyone else looking at the southern sky at 10:55 pacific time, must have seen them.
content.summary: Two white-blue stars

content.detailedDescription:
At 2110 thurs. 06-12-2015 i observed what looked like the lights of a plane with an orb flying beside it, heading northbound right over i-95 in brevard county. the orb was white and went bright to dim randomly. both the orb and the other object flying which had red and green lights (which is why i figure a plane) kept splitting off from each other and shoot out east over the ocean and west only to return and keep flying northbound as i followed up i-95. this went on for over 15 minutes and eventually they both went west until out of sight. i did not record this with my phone but in the 15 minutes this was happening, i observed at least 20 other vehicles that had pulled over and stopped on the freeway to watch and several of those people were recording this with their cell phones. at hwy-50 and i-95 is when i noticed 2 planes and 2 helicopters flying west bound in the same direction maybe 3 minutes behind. not sure if this is related or not. also the craft with the red and green lights did move like a plane when it made turns the orb was the one making 90 degree turns at will and speeding up and slowing down to rejoin the flight pattern. i hope this will be helpful and hopefully someone will send in footage because of all the people pulled over pointing and aweing at this event just as many were filming it.

       thanks,

[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: It was an orb possibly following a plane or or craft splitting off flying east, west and returning to follow northbound.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time that i was informed about the ufo was four weeks ago in the vicinity of fort hood and copperas cove. the primary witness informed me that at his location: 31°08'43.2"n 97°46'48.3"w during guard duty, he informed me that he saw a ufo flying 45 - 60 degrees above the horizon around the hours of 20:00 to 23:00. on occasion, the ufo would disappear and reappear (especially when ah-64s go on maneuvers heading west). the witness additionally informed me that the object appeared every time he has duty in the same location or moving to the same location coming from a northerly direction presumably in the direction that leads to gatesville. additionally, he has video footage of the object (which i am persuading him to share with mufon or to at least give it to me so i will be able to share this footage). on most of them, the object shown many different colors. on one footage, it showed the object breaking up into small forms of lights and back together again. most recently, he saw two objects in the sky.

as another witness to this phenomenon, i personally witnessed these objects a week ago from 31°08'41.9"n 97°47'25.9"w and a little clearer than the primary witness. at about sunset and at the beginning of twilight, i was able to see one object that appeared to be very white and disc-like hovering above the vicinity of the northern edge of copperas cove. on my way heading home and wanting to be a little more curious about the object, i took hell on wheels rd (the one-way road that heads west) and at approximately 31°08'49.4"n 97°47'40.2"w, i noticed a second object coming from the north of copperas cove wanting to join with the other object. as i focused on this moving object, i noticed a trail of visible energy unlike any manmade aircraft and suddenly, it cloaked in front of low-level clouds nearby. the second object that i was seeing previously also disappeared. 

about 1-3 minutes after this event, the primary witness (who was on duty during that time) called me and i immediately told him that i saw the objects. he shortly afterwards responded to me that he was currently witnessing the objects above him at 31°08'39.8"n 97°46'59.5"w. he told me that he was recording the event. i immediately pulled over to catch a glimpse; however, i was not able to see it. that was the last time we ever talked about the ufos. i'll try again tomorrow to see if i can be able to catch another glimpse of these visiting ufos and to talk with the primary witness.

to conclude, me and the primary witness were utilizing a website/app that tracks aircraft in the air and we were unable to locate this object. additionally, i talked with air force personnel who do meteorological work and asked them if there was any atmospheric disturbances locally. they said no.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusual ufo phenomenon in the vicinity of fort hood and coppreas cove

content.detailedDescription: Was watching t v & stepped outside. noticed large red-orange orb in sky,which was stationary,at first. after about 5 minutes,it moved from right to left, in a straight line, & started dripping red-orange drips, like it was melting. drips stopped & after a few more minutes, it started to get dimmer & dimmer, until it disappeared, slowly.
content.summary: Orb was stationary at first,moved & dripped red drips while moving & after it moved,then faded out, slowly

content.detailedDescription: While outside talking to the manager of my apartment complex i noticed an object in the sky that was hovering and was silent . after watching it zig-zag i took out my phone and proceeded to take pictures of the object but at my surprise it went from being a single object to splitting and becoming 2 separate objects and the dart off into the sky and a large rate of speed . the maanger actually noticed the object in the sky and suggested for me to look up originally i think the object was a helicopter or something similar as the police station is right across the street from my apartment complex but as i watched it split into 2 objects i knew there was no way that was a police helicopter . the object zig zag and was hovering it then began to split apart and then became 2 objects it then shot into the sky at a 45 degree angle and that was the last i saw of it . my feelings was that it was very interesting to see it i was not frightened by the objects and i was shocked it happened in huntington park because we never really hear or see objects over this part of town like the people that live in malibu or santa monica see i lost sight of the object as it shot into space at a 45 degree angle and that was the last i saw of it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Split into 2 objects , shot off into space at large rate of speed at 45 degree angle . zig zagged

content.detailedDescription: On may 25 2015 i was in my bath room. i looked out the window i saw this bright gold light round shaped object. it was moving above the tree tops and then it was above some gray and black clouds. i could see it through the clouds. i stood in amazement and it kept going  in a straight line towards my neighbors trees. it looked like it was going fast just skimming across the sky it had no sound.I could not believe what i was seeing and said what is that? i was so excited and ran to the front door saying i seen one. i was so excited. by the time my husband and i looked for it was gone or there was to many trees to see it. this has made me a believer. the object was shaped like a round cake pan with detail at the bottom and with the most beautiful gold color i have ever seen. this all happened at 5:23 a.M.
content.summary: Ufo skimming across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Our home was near downtown montreal. my father and i were sitting on our balcony. the sky was unusually clear that night. normally, skies in large cities are not clear due to lights. i have always loved looking at night skies.I was looking at the heavens when directly above my head i noticed two stars very close together. i had never seen stars so close together,nor have ithe decades since. i kept staring for about a minute because it puzzled me. i finally asked my father to look at them. he noticed them to. one of the stars started making a circular motion around the other star. obviously, it was not a star. we were dumbfounded. halfway around, it pulled away and moved southeast it was moving very fast. it continued looking like a star.Unfortunately, a building was in the way and we lost sight of it. we both agreed that it was not of this earth. a week later,i happened to see a short article in a large montreal newspaper. the president of an aerospace company was having a vacation with his family in england. they were walking along the cliffs of dover at night.He happened to see two stars unusually close together. one started making the same motion as i have described. he kept looking and  an astonishing thing happened. it abruptly moved at what appeared to be a ninety degree angle to its trajectory and then moved forward. a bit later it repeated the exercise,all this at a high speed.He stated that after what he saw he had no doubt that there is intelligent life in the universe. it is possible we saw the same thing thousands of miles apart. he was fortunate that his view was not obstructed.Unfortunately, i never contacted him.Stupid on my part.Decades later, it remains solidly in my mind and for an unknown reason the sight has always troubled me.
content.summary: A 'star' started moving at high speed

content.detailedDescription: Saw an unidentifiable object on monday night, june 8. i am still processing what i saw, but then read entry from hamilton on june 10, describing the same object. my son and i were out in daylight (but soon after sun set) and i pointed out an object hovering over lake ontario, close to the beach line in hamilton. it would have been about a mile out, hovering about 500 metres over the lake. had i not known the area very well, i would have thought it a star and my depth-perception off. we watched it for about 10 minutes, thinking it was a plane reflecting the sun, but it never moved, only hovered. it was close enough to know it was not a helicopter, and there was no sun remaining to reflect off the object. thinking it was nothing, we continued on. at 11pm my children and i were dropping one of their friends off closer to the lake, but more east on the lower stoney creek side. again, we see the same bright orb over the lake, in close proximity to where we saw the object approximately 2 hours before, but it appeared to be hovering a little higher, but closer to the city. we waited for it to move for about 15 minutes, thinking it was an object moving towards us, only to realise it was hovering and not making a sound. watching it was mesmerizing and it was very hard to look away.
content.summary: Glowing white orb over lake ontario, hamilton side

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to adrian (georgia) on highway 15 around 12:54pm, i was taking a picture of a cloud. i stopped the car and stepped out of the car to take a second picture of the cloud. i did not notice the object, just the cloud. as i always take pictures of clouds. to my amazement ,i seen this object in the cloud. i did not even hear anything when i stepped out of the car to take a picture with my cell phone.
it is not a reflection. one picture i took through the windshield of my car and the 2nd picture was taken outside my car. 
the date on the photo was wrong. may 25th and not may 26, 2015 typed in the wrong number.
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Flat on bottom, grey metallic , shape triangle, top disappeared into clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was sixteen years old at the time. i went out for a short evening walk in a residential neighborhood. it was an unusually calm cloudless evening with a blue sky. i was deep in thought thinking about school as i walked through a crosswalk. out of nowhere i suddenly felt as if i were being watched. for whatever reason i quickly looked up and down from the sky and saw part of an object hovering with a triangular point or sharp edge. i was immediately spooked and walked forward briskly for about ten minutes. i finally stopped and thought at first this is foolish so turned and looked up and the object wasn't there, but as i looked behind me down the street a large red solid circular ball of light hovered for about five minutes motionless high above a house. then it dissipated by closing in to the center of the object or light. i walked for approximately ten minutes forward down the street when i saw the same circular red orb light or object hovering above another house. it too last about five minutes before disappearing. then directly across the street from where i was standing, half way between the first red orb sighting and the second, a whole bunch of opaque whitish circles of varying sizes moved back and forth dissipating into each other like a propulsion system or gas trail. then came the final sighting. a few minutes after i passed under a tree and on the opposite side saw an oval object so far away high in the sky, cloud level even though there was no clouds. it had a gleam on the upper back metallic side and looked like it was moving slowly upwards at a forty-five degree angle. suddenly the object seemed to pick up speed as a thin red line appeared as a trail from the object. the sky around the object turned a very deep reddish orange and then all was gone. no trail, no reddish sky.
content.summary: red orbed lights and oval disk object 45 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: on 05/26/15 at approximately 4:00am the witness claimed to be awakened by her three inside pet dogs barking and acting up. the witness came to her front room and peered out a window from inside to observe a pulsating greenish blue orb in the south east direction that rose up above the treetops and hovered for approximately 5 minutes before changing it's color to violet and simply vanishing before her eyes. upon the objects disappearance her dogs settled down. the area where the sighting occurred is densely wooded and on posted private property across the street from the witnesses house. about a week later after the incident one afternoon the witness was outside in her front yard with her dogs when they acted up again, she stated she and her dogs could sense a thickness in the air and a feeling like static electricity was in the atmosphere. she felt uneasy like someone was watching her so she and her dogs then went inside. as a mufon field investigator i remain in contact with the witness as she lives nearby and would prefer to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Upon waking up from her three dogs barking and acting up the witness stated at approximately 4:00am on 05/26/15 witness observed a hovering bluish green orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck at the back of my house. i was having a cigarette and looking at the stars. from the corner of my roof to behind my neighbours roof i saw a bright light. it was solid, bright and travelled faster and lower then a plane. there was no noise, it just zipped past. i got up to see if i could see if it went past the roof or higher up. then it zipped past going in the opposite direction. at first i thought, what did i just see. then when it flew back i thought, i think i just saw a ufo. i was stunned, i've never seen anything like that before. we have planes flying over all the time but i can see the lights flashing. this light never flashed. i lost sight because of being at the back of the house.
content.summary: A bright white light traveled east to west, observed from back yard, disappeared behind neighbours roof. a few seconds later it appeared again going west to east.

content.detailedDescription: I returned home saturday june 6 at about 12:15 am. got out of my car in driveway and saw something out of corner of my eye. did double take and saw object hovering about 10 ft. off ground about 10-20 feet away from me. took off my glasses to see if it was a reflection. also checked to see if it was floaters ( threads or spots in field of vision). it was neither. the object appeared as a fine line/thread about 5-10 feet across. on each end of the thread was an very narrow oblong area about 1/5 or 1/6 the width of the thread, each of which was white. the object hovered, moving up and down and side to side but remaining horizontal. there was no sound. the object appeared to be "ghostly" or transparent. i did not feel any particular way, no fear. just amazed to see this thing! did not have phone/camera on me, and didn't even think to run inside house to get it. watched for about 20 minutes then went inside. looked out window of door and still saw object. went to bed.
content.summary: 5-10 ft.Wide, hovering next to my driveway, 10-20 ft. high. a long string/line with a very narrow oblong shape at each end, which were white. object appeared fuzzy/transparent. stayed horizontal while moving up and down, side to side

content.detailedDescription: Well i was stepping out of the house to smoke because i didn't want my parents to catch me and a few steps out i heard the swooshing of helicopter blades and first saw a apache like helicopter then two huey like helicopters then this ball of light the size of the helicopters and then two more huey like helicopters with another apache helicopter and off to the side at a different altitude a shanook like helicopter in a supervisor like position following. during the whole thing i was in disbelief i lost sight because of the trees. i could see that the object produced it's own light because it shown on the helicopters and the tree tops with the same color as the object. then my little brother called out my name and all i could say was did u see that. he said yes what was it i said i don't know maybe a ufo. then after that the whole family seen strange lights hovering on a large hill not far from our home. kinda like how the lights behave at that black mailbox i see in tv programs.
content.summary: A ball of light that looked like the sun in color about 25ft in size

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was in june of 2008. i and my children were leaving fairbanks, alaska and headed by car to the canadian border to eventually get to the lower 48 states. i had past tok, alaska several hours ago, maybe about 4. it was the last town we had come to before we went into a vast area of the alaskan wilderness where there is absolutely nothing there but wilderness. we had been driving for a while and hadn't passed any other cars on the road, or houses, or anything for that matter that i can recall. it was very late. i believe it was around 3 or 4 in the morning. my children were asleep. my older son was 11 at the time. he was asleep in the front seat next to me. my younger sone was 9 at the time, and he was asleep in the back. i don't remember how the light appeared or where it came from. i don't remember it appearing period. but i found myself suddenly looking at a very bright light in the middle of the road. it was extremely bright. it was only one light. it looked like it was smack in the middle of the road up ahead. my first thought was that it was a vehicle that only had one headlight working, and obviously must have had its brights on. i would say it appeared to be about 150 to 200 feet ahead of us. i slowed down my speed because it was blinding me. i assumed that we would be passing each other soon on the road. i eventually pulled over to the side of the road to let this thing pass me. because not only was i blinded, but also it looked as though, again, it was partly in my lane. however, we never did; it never passed me. i then thought it was a broken down vehicle, and further away then i first estimated, because i kept thinking, surely i should have passed it already or it should have passed me. i started to drive again when i realized this thing was not going to be passing me. i started to drive. again, it looked as though it was a big semi about to plow us over, so i pulled over a second time to let it by. this time i tried to awaken my older son in the front seat. i wanted him to see this light and help me figure out what it was, or just simply tell me what he saw. i was very tired and had been driving for many hours and thought maybe i was not seeing straight. i couldn't come up with any other explanation, for all other rational explanations were quickly being depleted. i could not awaken my older son, so i began to shake my younger child in the back. he too would not awaken. at this time i started to freak out slightly and get a little scared. the light is not making sense to me, and my children surely would have awoken to my shaking and my voice that had to of sounded a little worried and unusual to them. i then had a thought that i'm out here in the middle of nowhere, with my kids in a car, stopped on the side of the road. i thought that this could be a set-up, a trick, and someone could be approaching us right now while i'm just sitting here. so, despite my almost inability to drive and see the road because of the blinding, i again pulled onto the road and started driving out of fear of being stationary. again, we never passed "the car", "the semi", "the train coming down the middle of the road", or whatever it was. we never got closer to it, never passed it, and it never pulled away or off the road. it seemed to always be the same distance from us, and right smack in front of us, regardless of how much distance i drove, or regardless of any turns or bends in the road. and then, just as it was "just there" and i don't recall it appearing or how it appeared or when it appeared, now it was just gone. and now i was driving ahead as though nothing was ever there.
content.summary: I was travelling to the canadian border in the middle of the night with my children. a bright light blinded me, forcing me to pull over to the side twice because i couldn't see the road well.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my kitchen (in a mobile home) talking to a friend who was about to leave.  it had just gotten dark and it was not winter.  sometime from late spring to early fall.
suddenly, we were bathed in brilliant yellow light.  i was shocked and looked out of the window.  it was apparent from the shadows that the light was coming from directly above my home.  for a moment, i was trying to figure out how a car coming down the street could do this.  then i was struck by the absolute silence.
my son - about 3 - was sleeping on the love seat in my living room - in complete view of where i was standing.
being a mother, i immediately looked over to where he was to be sure he was safe.
again i was shocked that even though the curtains were pulled, he, too, was bathed in yellow light.
i was stunned by this!  i was so afraid.  
i looked back at my friend and i could see she was afraid, too.
then the light was gone.
i tried to talk to her about what had happened.  she acted like nothing had happened but almost ran out of my house saying she had to get home.
i spent years staying up all night - a part of me...
actually who is going to read this and do any of you give a good [item moved/cms/nd] about any of this.
i actually tried to report this to mufon years ago and don't remember getting any response.
i have suffered my entire life and all you want to do is rack up statistics.
tell you what - have a real human [item moved/cms/nd] come visit me or just forget it.
content.summary: Was in kitchen with friend when brilliant yellow light from above flooded us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch with my dog and as i was lust looking around saw a vairly large bright flame colored object with a very distinct flame colored trail rising above it..My first thought was it looked like watching comet hailbop in 97 except it was brighter and closer...
my next thought was meteor..However after very slowly decending srtaight down it stopped and was staionary in the sky....
it sat there another minute or two before just very slowly fading out...
i always watch the skies..And am wondering if this was reported by anyone else...

thanks :)
content.summary: My first thought when i saw it was it looks like comet hailbop did in 97...

content.detailedDescription: I sat outside on my front steps after dinner.  the clouds were very strange, and i noticed that they were looking weird since that morning when i was driving my kids to school.  i noticed a crazy looking misty transparent cloud with what looked like cracks or trails through it. ive never seen anything like it, so i took out my phone and started recording. the recording is 6 mins 47 seconds of me just scanning the sky for more weird clouds. a huge chemtrail made its appearance too. it wasnt until i played it back that i discovered a bright ball of something glide its way down to a dimmer light below it. as the bright ball was moving a glowing tail trailed out of the back of it. the video is choppy because like i said, i didnt even realize that was there at that point.  but i took some stills and enlarged them. i dont know if my eyes are playing tricks on me but i think there are more smaller lights moving around in that same area. shooting around in different directins. my first reaction was shock and disbelief. watching the video over and over again trying to make sense of it all. i really want to know what mufon thinks about it.  the video can be viewed at [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Took a video. it is on youtube     not enough room to explain.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard grilling, and sat down to relax. i bright object caught my eye so i tilted my phone up and started recording. the object had disappeared, but then emerged from behind (above it looks like) an old jet contrail. it left no contrail itself and was much faster than any plane. it did not look like a meteor or falling star and maintained a steady course towards the northwest. i lost sight of it when it went behind the trees.
content.summary: Bright star-like object streaked much faster than a plane from behind an old contrail

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) was in his bedroom just starring outside his bedroom window to the east when all of a sudden, a bright flash of yellow/white light illuminated the whole window and the entire room with light. the light source appeared to be about the size of the sun.
content.summary: Bright flash of yellow/white light filled my room, last about 2 sec, on/off like a light switch.

content.detailedDescription: Adding video of report #66141 attn. bill schroeder.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 3.57am europe gmt time when looking to the general sky scenery something cought my eye aproaching from my right to my left pov.

it was very fast when compared to the size or a airplane, around 10x the size of a a320 following a domestic path, this when looking at the same supposed distance/height, a height where you can clearly distinguish the winglets/ tail lights. compared to a star which is only a small dot it would be roughly around 100x's the size, alot brighter!

regarding the brightness: this object was very bright, enough to made me turn my head and aknowledge it's presence. it made a small straight path horizontally, this while getting brighter. just imagine 1 (one) true white led of a flashlight, now put it in a dark room, make a small path with your hand holding the flashlight and you have a rough idea.

then, the most impressive thing about this sight, it pulsated for about 1 second, and it switched direction  in a rigid "v" shaped maneuver and it left a trail in the sky for about 1 second that quick disapeared while bliking the eye. the pulse was obvious, as also was the trail. it was basically like the entreprise warming up and going to warp speed in the well known movie. but alot more distance in this one.

no idea of the origin, who made etc. just clearly something not natural, like the shooting star that preceeded it around 4m. the type of light, movement nature (something not being propeled with fuel combustion engines, much more smoother), the relative velocity of the path in the sky and way it went to "warp" in a v shapped 180º change of direction.... just unbelieveble.

also, is anyone is closer to this it would be blind looking at it. this was  pure 7000k white, very homogeneous/soft but also solid light there!
content.summary: Big led bright object with straigh path, then sudden warp speed type of path change.
